text:
@NYGovCuomo The richest country in the world, where in NYC, exhausted doctors and nurses are being barraged with patients with Coronavirus and having to wear Halloween masks as protection gear. 

If there is a God, hear us now. We have a 'President' that is worse than any virus. Help us.
